name: Bill's Affair
description:
BILL'S AFFAIR

——GOTY AWARD NOMINEE 1937——

There is only one other game like this on the market, and that would be the demo. Play this amazing, absolutely enthralling, pretty much perfect visual novel that portrays the intricacies and movements of the Bill Clinton 1998 Scandal. In this game, you play as Monica Lewinsky, on a search to seduce Bill Clinton and have an affair with him. Can you do it? Can you find Bill Clinton? Can you find your Clozaril and banish George Bush? Can you have an affair with Bill Clinton?  Can you? 

I don't know, maybe. It's not exactly that hard (or maybe it is.)

(I would suggest a slow text speed and full screen mode, for the feels. I also have taken extreme liberties in my re-telling of this '90s tale, but, trust me, it's good.
